values: I got asked if I could do some cupcakes for tomorrow (at lunchtime today) for a girl in the office who is leaving tomorrow to take up a secondment (eek we seem to be loosing a lot of them recently). I know she likes chocolate I have just bought a Kelly special cupcake scoop and thought I really need to try to pipe icing as well. The topping is Thornton's Milk & White Chocolate buttons and fudge pieces. Cx
my first wedding cake without the topper from the bride with the topper from the bride Carol
recent cakes the guy for the the emblem cake is currently refusing to cut the top tier. Cx
my afternoons work today. Carol
some last minute cakes and then one I have had 2 weeks to plan and organise this is the one I have had 2 weeks to organise.  I was given nail polish as a theme for the cake! hmm fun now bed. Cxx
Pilchard - egg, milk, wheat and gluten free Bob the Builder - egg, milk, wheat and gluten free Plain cake yay
Well this was the completed cake. It tasted even better than it looks from what I have been told. Cx
Got the order for this one on Tueday - may get a wedding cake (July) and upto 70 other birthday cakes :s Cx

Have a good time in the next 2 weeks not going to be on line much so here is a cutey for you.

Cxx

ok so i have been very quiet here recently - i have been busy starting my business and learning sugar craft so i thought i would show you my first ever attempt - all the flowers and things are mine  but Alan Dunn put the arrangement together for me. I have just finished a 3 day course with Alan Dunn this weekend and the above is what i made.  I am in the middle of a 10 week sugar crafting course in Forres right now as well.  I am through in Aberdeen this weekend and next weekend - will more than likely not be at elizium as i am completely broke right now but would be available to meet up for a coffee in the afternoon iof any one wants to meet up. My lappy is still broken so other than getting info up on to my website i haven't been able to do much of the design but the url is cakes and bakes site so it is only copy right now. oh well better get up and get ready for work since i start in 20 minutes :s Cxx

side 1
Side of a cake for friend who had a baby last week - this is my first ever attempt at this style
Ok so a very good friend of mine gave birth to a baby girl last Thursday and i said that i would make a cake for her. so here is my first attempt at proper sugarcrafting. oh yeah i have an appointment with an HIE guy to get info on starting my business i am going to do cakes and bakes. more pics are available in my scrap book Scrapbook. so yeah i am all go right now

Ok so you have added me as a friend what in your right mind makes you think that after everything you put me through at school I would want in any way shape of form want to have any contact with you???? I know you weren't exactly a nice person at school to me but I at least thought you got the message when my parents called the police to find out how to make you leave me alone, or when I abruptly left town at the very beginning of S6. I want you to respect my request 9 years ago and my continuing wish of leave me the fuck alone and never contact me again.

Ok this journal is Friends only so leave me a comment and I will consider adding you.

FP
